attributes.action: Abolish the House of Lords and give England its on government.
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned believe that the unelected House of Lords should be abolished to make way for an elected English government.

The current Westminster government should become an "impartial" UK government and the devolved goverments of England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland should have devolution max powers to look after their own affairs while being a part of the UK.

We believe that the current setup of the Westminster government does not work and does not refelct fairness and equality to all parts of the UK.

Yours Sincerely

UK Citizens
